name: CWW connector Lite – Connect Contact Form 7 & ActiveCampaign
author: Code Work Web

sections.description:
CWW Connector Lite is an addon for contact form 7 which allows you to collect leads from contact form 7 to ActiveCampaign.
This simple yet powerful plugin sends contact form 7 data to ActiveCampaign.
The plugin is straightforward to use, also there is detailed documentation to set it up.

Feedback

If you like this plugin, then please leave us a good rating and review.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Minor refinements & improvements.

1.0.1

  • Tested with latest WordPress.

1.0.0

  • Initial plugin release.
